options.content: Avg availability of services shown here includes data from all events (platform caused and user errors)

targets.query:
loadbalancer_availability
| where $__timeFilter(['date'])// and region  in ($Region)
| summarize dcount(id)

Storage_Availability
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
| summarize dcount(id)

Aksservernode_Availability
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
| summarize dcount(id)

Loadbalancer_Availability
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
| summarize dcount(id)

Firewall_Availability
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
| summarize dcount(id)

Cosmosdb_Availability
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
| summarize dcount(id)

Keyvault_Availability
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
| summarize dcount(id)

Eventshub_Availability
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
| summarize dcount(id)

Cognitive_Svc_Availability
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
| summarize dcount(id)

Container_Registry_Availability
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
| summarize dcount(id)

LogAnalytics_Availability
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
| summarize dcount(id)

Subscriptions
|join Aksservernode_Availability on subscriptionId
| project component, createdAt, ['date'], id, location, name, nodeNotReady,
 nodeReady, nodeUnknown,solution, subscriptionId,tenancy, availability = ((nodeReady )/(nodeNotReady +nodeReady))*100
| where $__timeFilter(['date'])
 and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
 and solution in ($Solution)
| summarize aksservernode = (avg(availability)) by ['date']

Subscriptions
|join Container_Registry_Availability on subscriptionId
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and isnotnull(successfulPullCount) and isnotnull(totalPullCount) and isnotnull(successfulPushCount) and isnotnull(totalPushCount)
 and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
 and solution in ($Solution)
| summarize acr = avg(((successfulPullCount+successfulPushCount)/(totalPullCount+totalPushCount))*100) by ['date']

Subscriptions
|join Storage_Availability on subscriptionId
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and isnotnull(availability)
 and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
 and solution in ($Solution)
| summarize storage = (avg(availability)) by ['date']

Subscriptions
|join Loadbalancer_Availability on subscriptionId
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and isnotnull(availability)
 and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
 and solution in ($Solution)
| summarize loadbalancer = (avg(availability)) by ['date']

panels.title: Load Balancer Avg [Successful Tx / All Tx]

targets.query:
Subscriptions
|join Firewall_Availability on subscriptionId
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and isnotnull(availability)
 and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
 and solution in ($Solution)
| summarize firewall = (avg(availability)) by ['date']

Subscriptions
|join Cosmosdb_Availability on subscriptionId
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and isnotnull(availability)
 and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
 and solution in ($Solution)
| summarize cosmosdb = (avg(availability)) by ['date']

panels.title: Cosmos DB Avg [Successful Tx / All Tx]

targets.query:
Subscriptions
|join Keyvault_Availability on subscriptionId
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and isnotnull(availability)
 and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
 and solution in ($Solution)
| summarize keyvault = (avg(availability)) by ['date']

panels.title: Key Vault Avg [Successful Tx / All Tx]

targets.query:
Subscriptions
|join Cognitive_Svc_Availability on subscriptionId
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and isnotnull(availability)
 and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
 and solution in ($Solution)
| summarize csa = (avg(availability)) by ['date']

Subscriptions
|join Eventshub_Availability on subscriptionId
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and isnotnull(incomingRequests) and isnotnull(serverErrors)
 and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
 and solution in ($Solution)
| summarize eventhubs = avg((incomingRequests-serverErrors)/incomingRequests)*100 by ['date']

Subscriptions
|join LogAnalytics_Availability on subscriptionId
| where $__timeFilter(['date']) and isnotnull(availability)
 and location in ($Region) and subscriptionId in ($Subscriptions)
 and solution in ($Solution)
| summarize loganalytics = avg(availability) by ['date']

list.definition:
Subscriptions
| join Subscription_Names on subscriptionId
| where solution in ($Solution)
| extend valueAndText = strcat(subscriptionId, "|", name)
| project valueAndText
list.name: Subscriptions
list.query:
Subscriptions
| join Subscription_Names on subscriptionId
| where solution in ($Solution)
| extend valueAndText = strcat(subscriptionId, "|", name)
| project valueAndText

list.name: Region
